topic.title: Research of ZeroNet
topic.body: Hello, i need some reference articles to understand ZeroNet work Flow. for academic researches.

topic.title: Some security questions
topic.body:
Hello, i have some questions.
1. Is it possible to send invalid data? For example, can i submit date of  new topic at zeroNet to any time before implementation of zeroNet platform?, if i change source code of zero net or zerotalk? Why, If can not?
2. Related to last question, can i use random function? Can i validate generated random number at other nodes? For example i have an random coin generator at a game and dont wanna they change coins manually. I know its not client-server, but i need a way. 
At other example: imagine you have a random movement at a game and your clinet should be move base on this random movement.
3. Can i make websocket connection between peers? Can i have peers ip by ZeroFrame.js?

Sry for my English and thank you.

topic.title: hello, i got some errors on my zite
topic.body:
can you help me? im using unity game engine.
1BkyaBHKaAkc9pNSFGQrTaubj6eH5ADHod

1598827107_1Au471PrXrTD9fdN8uQR4W93qMunb.body:
> [peppefail](#comment_56_1DnpB2yFpVwyhA29h2rRsifGVEC1sXLzgJ): zeromepro 

@zeromepro question is better than me. i need know how things work on zeroNet core?

1598912261_1Au471PrXrTD9fdN8uQR4W93qMunb.body:
> [anshorei](#comment_154_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk8dJVS): The only thing that is validated is ownership of data using bitcoin cryptography (i.e. did bitcoin address 1AddRESs sign this data? y/n) [...]

thank you for the awesome answer.
so, there is not any validation at ZeroTalk and i can send a new topic, before the ZeroTalk Creation. attention to the "new" topic word. im talking about new data with new address, not changing data. new data has new address and i am submitting invalid date Time. then i have new address and valid bit address. at this example. im not changing other people data.

> [driud](#comment_115_18yZKKFySP5bvmNy14T9vgj3H99AC1PQkH): Interesting question?Interesting answer.Can it be damaged, harmed, or modified badly?For the user.And the user won't notice it?.Ciekawe pytanie ?Ciekawa odpowied≈∫.Czy mo≈ºna To uszkodziƒá, zaszkodziƒá, ≈∫le zmodyfikowaƒá?Dla u≈ºytkownika.I u≈ºytkownik tego nie zauwa≈ºy?

around my researches about ZeroNet.
i think it is possible, if developer of zite not attention to validating data that are coming from other people and you should block that zite. in other side, bad access to data and your resources (like mining or writing Trojan) not allowed from ZeroNet Core. you should use ZeroNet from main source to protect your self from bad changes on core.
im not sure about Trojans :/
it is my question too. but i am developer and i want know about protecting zite and users.
hackers discovering new ways, every days.

1599297078_1HMvhRJegHrC92gxZhrPBeATg69tZ.body: How can i start learning concepts of and app development on IPFS. Is it development platform and libraries?

1600031682_1Au471PrXrTD9fdN8uQR4W93qMunb.body:
> [swashbuckler](#comment_41_13UJZwpkQASN9unpc9hLhmwyauXzzatQgQ): What do you mean by 'most zites are closed'? Probably there are no trackers available?

No when i am open target zite. I see "this zite closed" message.

> [swashbuckler](#comment_42_13UJZwpkQASN9unpc9hLhmwyauXzzatQgQ): Can you give example links?

Ok i deleted them, i will mention you here if i found them again

1600446346_1Au471PrXrTD9fdN8uQR4W93qMunb.body:
> [claude](#comment_11_1MUCEEtbLUYFpc6vqhp4F5u4ia8MJ9RGK1): "ZeroNet should censor content I personally don't like by default" [...]

Yes this is big problem, and governments not supporting ZeroNet. 
Idea 1: this blacklist or filter list can be work by votes from peaple, peaple know about what is bad for child's and in other side, website owners has biggest vote. But the problem is security of the list. 
idea 2 : ZeroNet owners can handle this list because they are controlling current blacklist plugin. And they are only checking websites that peaple voting.
Idea 3 : each ZeroNet client can define content controller service before Hello page. for example we have government content controller service, ZeroNet Content Controller service and peaple made controller service. So, the user can choose one of them to continue browsing zites.
There is many other ways.  They can fix problem if they talk about that. ZeroNet is free to use in any way, but should be controlled on default settings. Like some websites that asking peaple are you +18 and how old are you, for example.

> [nekololi](#comment_490_1FzZsDQdh8wk71bDLxURPzmAt2FXehoNAB): can the child, if they choose to do so, disable this plugin of yours and proceed to browse zeronet without its protection?

A child can open por. websites at internet. But they should not open. the problem is showing that Content at main page of ZeroSites.

> [xcape2net](#comment_789_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): You shouldn't be inviting kids onto ZeroNet.  It was not designed to protect them.  It was designed to be a free speech platform.  You're asking for a censorship plugin for a free speech platform .  It doesn't make sense. You may as well be asking for a screen door for your submarine.

Yes , im not invite them. Never. But i dont know, who's i am speaking with them. Forums not safe but a forum that made for childs can help to protect new users of ZeroNet. I dont know what happen if a child disable protection plugin. But i know this protection not for you. Any one can speak free.

> [kaffie](#comment_1156_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): Letting the internet parent your child is a bad idea. There's NO way to lock someone out, if they have physical access to the computer. With enough time, knowledge, and patience you can get through any security measure you might want to put in place. [...]

ü§îüëçThen childs should not never join ZeroNet or any P2P network.
